resources.string: Final Year Informatics Engineering Undergraduate Student in Institut Teknologi Sepuluh Nopember. Specializing in Back-End Technologies, Cloud (AWS), and XR Development.
Iam actively developing backend infrastructure for companies or personal websites.

▪ Currently developing Tazma Optik (Optic Store based in Bandung, Indonesia) website. 
 ▪ Developing business modules such as vendor purchases module, monitoring module, cashier module, expenditure module, branch sales module, etc. 
 ▪ Actively developing Backend infrastructure using Laravel, Node.js, ASP.Net Core. 
 ▪ Proficient in using MySQL, PostgreSQL, SQL Server Databases.
Otoritas Jasa Keuangan (OJK) is a Financial Services Authority responsible for overseeing and regulating the financial services industry in Indonesia

\u25AA Developing a robust data visualization and reporting infrastructure, leveraging Tableau and SQL Server. \n \u25AA Utilized by internal auditors and risk data analysts, offering real-time auditing and risk insights.
A research development project led by Prof. Drs. Ec. Ir. Riyanarto Sarno, M. Sc, Ph. D to develop AR application that helped Medical Student to understand human brain using Augmented Reality.

\u25AA Proficiently utilized Unity3D and Vuforia Engine to create a real-time augmented reality (AR) Android application. Demonstrated expertise in AR technology, ensuring seamless integration of tracking features for an immersive user experience. \n \u25AA Utilized 3D Slicer software to transform authentic brain MRI images into 3D objects, seamlessly integrating them into the AR application.

A research and development initiative, under the leadership of Dr. Eng. Yuda Apri Hermawan, S.T., M.T., was undertaken to create a ship maneuvering application. This application is designed to assist ship designers in ensuring compliance with IMO regulations during the ship design phase, thus streamlining the shipbuilding process.
\u25AA Using Unity3D Engine to implement 3d ship maneuvering visualization.
One of business unit in PT. ITS Tekno Sains focused in Training and Certification.

\u25AA Conducted training sessions aimed at beginners in Unity3D game development. \n \u25AA Mentored 15 students in the development process, resulting in 3 students achieving the remarkable milestone of publishing their games on the Google Play Store.
Educational and skills learning course platform from practicing tutors.
\u25AA Assigned the responsibility of analyzing the Educator.id system as part of the upcoming website development project at Educator.ID.
